title: 108_hr3083
content: Country of Origin Labeling Amendment Act of 2003 - Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to revise country of origin labeling provisions, including: (1) specifying the model certification of origin program, (2) specifying producer protections, (3) reducing maximum retailer fines. (4) prohibiting treatment of country of origin violations as adulteration or misbranding, and (5) extending the implementing guideline deadline.
